name: OVERVIEW: A Walk Through The Universe
description: Overview is a spectacular documentary about our position in the Universe. With a narrative and an interactive mode, it features realistic imagery and accurate data to leave you in awe and wonder at the vastness of the cosmos.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 equivalent or greater Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 equivalent or better Storage: 1000 MB available space Additional Notes: Please set your Windows Power Plan to "High performance"
